ygData.subject: RE: Neriak Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: Nah.  No problem.  I was wondering what level group could do it, anyway. BUT, I *was* also wondering when you could solo for it...    would you have to be 30+
ygData.messageBody:
Nah. No problem. I was wondering what level group could do it, anyway.

BUT, I *was* also wondering when you could solo for it... would you have to be 30+ ?

Dreven -- seeker of stuph

> ----------
> From: Cristie[SMTP:cristie@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 5:57 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eq_wizards] Neriak Robes
>
> From: Cristie <cristie@...>
>
> I dun think so... a group in the mid 20s would work from what I
> understand...I haven't acquired one yet, but I'm not up there in levels due
> to lack of playing time lately.. :) I could be wrong though.. I didn't
> mean to imply that one person alone could get this item..but I guess it
> kinda looked that way... (you'll have to excuse my quicky reply)... that
> would be tough unless the player was way up there
>
>
> At 1025 7/20/99 -0700, you wrote:
> >From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
> >
> >To even stand a chance at getting the Flowing Black Robe.. you've got to
> >be near lvl 30.. correct?
> >
> >Dreven
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: Cristie[SMTP:cristie@...]
> > > Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> > > Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 5:08 PM
> > > To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> > > Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Neriak Robes
> > >
> > > From: Cristie <cristie@...>
> > >
> > > Ya know, I agree with um...mstokes I believe (too lazy to scroll back
> > > there) and I mentioned this before in my earlier post.. how about buying
> > > yourself a goss robe? Its A/C is 8 and isn't a bad robe ... its white and
> > > looks good..albeit still a bathrobe look...you should be able to pick one
> > > up for some plat or go to befallen and head to third level and acquire one
> > > yourself.. :) its much more satisfying to be able to get one
> > > yourself...really. OR invis and run through nek forest to lavastorm
> > and go
> > > into the dungeon Najena and wait with the other throngs to try to get a
> > > flowing black robe off Najena. Might be a fun challenge for you...it'll
> > > just take some time is all....
> > >
